remarks: Lemma for ~ sadass .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
statement:
sadasslem.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ NN0 ) $.
sadasslem.2 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ NN0 ) $.
sadasslem.3 $e |- ( ph -> C C_ NN0 ) $.
sadasslem.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
sadasslem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A sadd B ) sadd C ) i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) = ( ( A sadd ( B sadd C ) ) i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) ) $.
